text: Egha God kamaghɨn Adam mɨgei, “Nɨ uan amuimɨn akam baregha, temer ovɨzir nɨ daman kɨ nɨn anogoroghezim ame. Kamaghɨn nɨ amizir arazir kam bangɨn, kɨ datɨrɨghɨn nguazim gasɨghasightɨ, dagheba deragh an otivan kogham. Egh nɨ zurara nguazir kamɨn ikiamin dughiamɨn, nɨ dagheba deragh otivsɨ, ingangarir dafabara nguazimɨn dar amuam.
